===Overview===
The '''Ottoman Empire''' (دولت عليه عثمانیه‎) also known as the Turkish Empire, was a state that controlled much of Southeast [[Europe]], Western [[Asia]] and North [[Africa]] between the 14th century and early 20th century. It's capital and cultural centre was [[Constantinople]], [[Turkey]].

===Events===
===15th Century===
In 1456 A.D., the Ottoman Empire invaded [[Hungary]]. [[Vlad Dracul (Earth-616)|Vlad Dracul]] and his sons [[Vlad Dracula (Earth-616)|Vlad Dracula]] and [[Radu Dracula (Earth-616)|Radu]] travelled to the Ottoman Empire, where they planned to negotiate for peace. They were ambushed ''en route'' by agents of Sultan [[Murad (Earth-616)|Murad II]], who held the sons captive, forcing Vlad the Elder to favor Turkey. This eventually led John Hunyadi and Vlad's other advisers to revolt against him, killing him and his son Mircea. After five years of torture, Radu had died in captivity.{{r|Tomb of Dracula Vol 2 2}} 

In 1459 A.D., Vlad had become king of the [[vampires]] and lured Murad into a trap. Dracula's female followers took out Murad's men while Dracula killed Murad personally. After feeding upon on Murad, Dracula tossed Murad's lifeless body to his men.{{r|Tomb of Dracula Vol 2 2}}

Later that year the Turkish warlord [[Turac (Earth-616)|Turac]] defeated Dracula who left him alive, hoping to use him to seize control of Transylvania.{{r|Dracula #2}} Another account suggested the Ottomans were helped by the immortal [[Homo superior|mutant]]; [[En Sabah Nur (Earth-616)|Apocalypse]] and his band of [[Dark Riders (Earth-616)|Dark Riders]].{{r|X-Men: Apocalypse vs. Dracula #1|4}}

In 1460 A.D. [[Greece]] was captured by the Ottoman Turks who absorbed the nation into the Ottoman Empire.{{r|Marvel Atlas Vol 1 1}}

===16th Century===
In 1526 A.D., the Ottoman Empire defeat the Hungarian forces, establishing control over most of the country.
===17th Century===
In 1699 A.D.,  Austrian Habsburgs under Leopold I expel the Ottoman Empire.

===19th Century===
In 1821 A.D., the Greeks rebelled against Turkish rule. {{r|Marvel Atlas Vol 1 1}}

In 1827 A.D., the Greeks won their independence.{{r|Marvel Atlas Vol 1 1}} 

===20th Century===
====[[World War I]]====
The Ottoman Empire joined [[Germany]] and [[Austro-Hungarian Empire]] in forming the Central Powers during World War I.

====Fall of the Empire====
The empire's defeat during [[World War I]] resulted in the loss of territory to the [[British Empire]] and [[French Empire]]. After the war of independence and the desolation of the monarchy, the Republic of [[Turkey]] was formed.
